sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import jobList from '../../../utils/main/section-experience/jobList'; import tick from '../../../assets/tick.svg'; function Jobs() { const jobCards = jobList.map((item) => ( item.index % 2 !== 0 ? (

  • {item.title}

    {item.location}

    {item.date}

    • {item.tasks.one}
    • {item.tasks.two}
    • {item.tasks.three}
    • {item.tasks.four}
    • ) : (

  • {item.title}

    {item.location}

    {item.date}

    • {item.tasks.one}
    • {item.tasks.two}
    • {item.tasks.three}
    • {item.tasks.four}
    • ) )); return (
      {jobCards}
    ); } export default Jobs;
